00096                 static int import_kvirc()
00097                 {
00098                         PyObject * pModule = PyImport_ImportModule("kvirc");
00099                         if(pModule)
00100                         {
00101                                 PyObject * pC_API_Object = PyObject_GetAttrString(pModule,"_C_API");
00102 
00103                                 if(!pC_API_Object) return -1;
00104 
00105                                 if(PyCObject_Check(pC_API_Object))
00106                                         PyKVIrc_API = (void **)PyCObject_AsVoidPtr(pC_API_Object);
00107 
00108                                 Py_DECREF(pC_API_Object);
00109                         }
00110                         return 0;
00111                 }
00112         #endif // KVIRC_MODULE
